BlightsExpanded.CustomBlightDef.label: blight
BlightsExpanded.CustomBlightDef.letterText: Blight has been discovered on the {PLANTDEF_labelPlural}! \nYou should cut or burn the affected plants before the blight spreads.

BlightsExpanded.CustomBlightDef.label: boomblight
BlightsExpanded.CustomBlightDef.letterText: Boomblight has been discovered on the {PLANTDEF_labelPlural}! \nEngineered long ago to improve crop yields by 50%, Boomblight has a side-effect of making crops intensely flammable. \nYou can cut the affected plants before the blight spreads, or harvest when the crops are mature and risk your fields exploding if lit on fire.

BlightsExpanded.CustomBlightDef.label: spiritblight
BlightsExpanded.CustomBlightDef.letterText: Spiritblight has been discovered on the {PLANTDEF_labelPlural}! \nAn ancient blight said to attract the vengeful spirits of hunted and slaughtered animals, Spiritblight slows growth by 25% but is otherwise harmless to plants. \nYou can cut the affected plants before the blight spreads, or harvest when the crops are mature.

BlightsExpanded.CustomBlightDef.label: hypergrowth
BlightsExpanded.CustomBlightDef.letterText: Signs of Hypergrowth have been discovered on the {PLANTDEF_labelPlural}! \nHypergrowth is a strange disease that makes crops grow twice as fast, but yield 55% less and constantly emit rotstink from the stress. \nYou can cut the affected plants before the blight spreads, or harvest when the crops are mature for half yield.

BlightsExpanded.CustomBlightDef.label: transformer mechanites
BlightsExpanded.CustomBlightDef.letterText: Transformer Mechanites have been discovered on the {PLANTDEF_labelPlural}! \nSemi-coherent mechanites that spread throughout plants, Transformer Mechanites halt growth and destroy the organic material within plants, leaving behind only metal. \nYou can cut the affected plants before the blight spreads, or allow it to spread to mature crops to harvest for more metal.

BlightsExpanded.CustomBlightDef.label: waster's breath
BlightsExpanded.CustomBlightDef.letterText: Waster's Breath has been discovered on the {PLANTDEF_labelPlural}! \nVenerated in many Waster cultures, Waster's Breath causes crops to yield 50% more, grow 25% slower, and emit toxic gas throughout their lifespans. \nYou can cut the affected plants before the blight spreads, or harvest when the crops are mature.
